attributes.action: Retain the UK's membership of the European Single Market
attributes.additional_details:
Www.gov.uk "Should the United Kingdom remain a member of the European Union or leave the European Union?"

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/504661/Alternatives_to_membership_possible_models_for_the_UK_outside_the_EU_Accessible.pdf

http://m.huffpost.com/uk/entry/uk_582ce0a0e4b09025ba310fce

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0xGt3QmRSZY
attributes.background:
The EU referendum did not mention leaving the Single Market. High-profile "Leave" campaigners explicitly claimed that it did not. The Norway model was included in Government info as an available option upon leaving EU.
A specific mandate must be sought & obtained prior to leaving the Single Market.
